parse.title: List of local multiplayer video games by system

text.*:
This article is an orphan, as no other articles link to it. Please introduce links to this page from related articles; try the Find link tool for suggestions. (July 2016)
This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.

This is a list of video games which can be played by multiple users on a singular device. This page is not about LAN Play.

Contents

  • 1 Computer
  • 2 Dreamcast
  • 3 GameCube
  • 4 Nintendo 64
  • 5 PlayStation
  • 6 PlayStation 2
  • 7 PlayStation 3
  • 8 PlayStation 4
  • 9 Super Nintendo Entertainment System
  • 10 Wii
  • 11 Wii U
  • 12 Xbox 360
  • 13 Xbox One
  • 14 Legend
  • 15 See also
  • 16 References
